#summary Ready to go LAMP Server Images

Below you will find a list of LAMP server images that you can download and run with [http://www.vmware.com/ VMware], [http://aws.amazon.com/ec2/ Amazon EC2] and other platforms. The goal is to be able to easily install and run PINF on any of these servers.

= Amazon EC2 =

*Status: Not tested*

  * Vendor: http://www.zend.com/
  * AMI ID: ami-51e30238
  * OS: Ubuntu 9 Server
  * Information: http://developer.amazonwebservices.com/connect/entry.jspa?externalID=2663
  * Tutorial: http://devzone.zend.com/article/4859-Get-Your-Cloud-on-with-Zend-Server-CE

= !ThoughtPolice =

*Status: Not tested*

  * Vendor: http://www.thoughtpolice.co.uk/
  * Images: http://www.thoughtpolice.co.uk/vmware/
  * OS:
    * CentOS
    * Debian
    * Fedora Core
    * FreeBSD
    * Ubuntu Server
  * *NOTE:* You will need to install a LAMP stack ([http://www.zend.com/en/products/server-ce/index ZendServer CE] for example).
